titleStmt.title: The black non-conformist discover'd in more naked truth proving that excommunication & confirmation ... and diocesan bishops are ... of human make and shape, and that not only some lay-men, but all the keen-cringing clergy are non-conformists ... / by Edm. Hickeringill ...
titleStmt.author: Hickeringill, Edmund, 1631-1708.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Larkin, and are to be sold by Richard Janeway ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
